author: Anthony Dunk
comment: Not sure if I'm missing something, but changing pen color using the spanner button seems to clear the screen on my Sony Smart watch 3... Which makes it impossible to draw in more than one color.
title: Good

author: Stuart Burch
comment: Changing colour wipes the screen. The same happens when sending an image to the phone. The app is thus perfect for recreating Ceal Floyer's 'Monochrome Till Receipt (White)'. Otherwise useless.
title: Drawn a blank

author: Dimitri C
comment: As soon as you bring up the menu in the app, it clears the drawing you have done. So you can't change colours, and can't send the image to your phone, so it's basically worthless.
title: Can't do anything with the drawing

author: Jimmy Crasto
comment: Wen am sending it to my phone, my phone asks of how to view the file. So please reply
title: Not able to send the drawing

author: Casen
comment: Here's some ideas for future updates: eraser.   background colors. Shapes. and text. Continue making this app very cool and useful!!!
title: Love this nice little app!

author: Adam Neeworth
comment: But when you change colour it clears your previous drawing
title: Alright

author: King V
comment: Make it so it won't wipe when change colors and il 5 star
title: Like it

author: Kat Higgins
comment: As soon as you change colour or share to phone it wipes the screen
title: Pointless

author: Mark Upcraft
comment: Please add shake to clear screen. Then it'll be 5 stars
title: Great so far

author: Arshia cheshmehalaei
comment: It dont work correct .When change color or want to share what drawed , page will clear and just send a white page .

author: Bendarian
comment: Yay finally a good drawing app!
title: Lg g watch

author: Megan Pocorus
comment: I'm about to Uninstall the app because  IT WILL NOT CLOSE.
title: Nope nope nope

author: Mark Bailey
comment: To everyone confused about closing the app... Yeah its not intuitive, but hit the spanner, swipe. You get Share, Clear Canvas and Close app. Seems obvious when you know! It boggled me for a good few minutes.
title: Nice idea

author: Steve Wylie
comment: Closing is easy, just have to remember to keep swiping to the left.  I'm still getting used to the  structure of Android Wear, which is swipe left through options and navigation.  The close button is the last one of the four options.
title: Super fun, works great

author: Patrick Bezzina
comment: Sorry but this app is essentially useless for a round display like the Moto 360. The options button, which also appears to be the only way to close the app is hidden off the screen in the top right corner. I have to uninstall to close. Can't give a high rating because it simply doesn't work on non-square devices. Great idea though

reply.author: Poly's Factory
reply.content: We support round screen watches in the latest version. Thank you for your feedback!

title: Incompatible with Moto 360

author: Dim Dayz
comment: Two finger press seems to be the only thing. Should be an option in that little wrench
title: Better Way to Close?

author: Kevin Rivera
comment: I can draw on my watch! And share that to my phone...I still have no reason to do so but it is nice knowing I can
title: Works!

author: Frankie M
comment: Not for a round face.Have to force close to get out of app.will change rating when fixed

reply.author: Poly's Factory
reply.content: It has been fixed in the latest version. Thank you for your feedback!

title: Nice app but can't close on a lg g watch r

author: Jason Wiese
comment: The button is off screen
title: Need a way to close/share on circular displays

author: Charles Francis
comment: How do you close this app on LG G Watch?
title: App can't close!?

author: Sanjay Mohan Dubey
comment: thanks dev!! guys wanna draw on ur AW Device, you gotcha this app!!!
title: rock solid 5 * app!!

author: Jesus Medrano
comment: Simple to use, lots of fun

author: Olivier Levitt
comment: Cool idea

author: Fernando Piris
comment: If I wanted to change the color used, the drawing disappeared. Any other options didn't work or simply crashed.
title: It doesn't work at all

author: Pie Tester
comment: Real unfair you are only allowed 2 play if u  have one of those thingy mbobs

author: Tim Seward
comment: Can not change colors. It erases the previous color everytime I try a new color
Cool
